comments:
Used Eclipse 3.1 M5 + cdt 3.0 I200503140300 build

If a C/C++ project is created by taking all the default setting(without 
selecting indexer, tracked in another PR), the indexer option in project's 
properties cannot be chosen. An error message "The currently displayed page 
contains invalid values"  will pop up and a log is generated.

Fixed in head + Tuesday morning build. Update code is automatically run on any
legacy projects to convert from old indexer to new source indexer.

- BG

Well, I just checked in today's build, it still happens ONLY on the managed 
make projects which are imported by "exsiting  projects" and failed on version 
convertion. So I am going to mark it as depending on bug 88110.

James could you verify this again.
PR 88110 been fixed.  Thanks

This has long been fixed since M6.

- BG
